entries.summary: Ms. Dahlmeier, 31, an experienced mountaineer, was climbing in Pakistan when she was hit by falling rocks, officials said.

summary_detail.value: Ms. Dahlmeier, 31, an experienced mountaineer, was climbing in Pakistan when she was hit by falling rocks, officials said.

entries.author: Zia ur-Rehman and Victor Mather

content.value: Ms. Dahlmeier won five gold medals at the 2017 biathlon world championships in Hochfilzen, Austria, among a total of seven in her career.

entries.title: Trump’s Mideast Envoy Heads to Israel Amid Global Fury Over Gaza Hunger

title_detail.value: Trump’s Mideast Envoy Heads to Israel Amid Global Fury Over Gaza Hunger

entries.summary: It will be the first known visit in months for Steve Witkoff, President Trump’s lead on the cease-fire and hostage talks. Since his last trip, conditions in the enclave have worsened.

summary_detail.value: It will be the first known visit in months for Steve Witkoff, President Trump’s lead on the cease-fire and hostage talks. Since his last trip, conditions in the enclave have worsened.

entries.author: Aaron Boxerman and Maggie Haberman

content.value: Steve Witkoff, President Trump’s Mideast envoy, in the Oval Office in May.

entries.title: Powerful Earthquake Rattles Russia’s Far East But Causes Little Damage

title_detail.value: Powerful Earthquake Rattles Russia’s Far East But Causes Little Damage

entries.summary: A 8.8-magnitude earthquake shook the remote, sparsely populated Kamchatka region and set off tsunami waves. No serious injuries were reported, officials said.

summary_detail.value: A 8.8-magnitude earthquake shook the remote, sparsely populated Kamchatka region and set off tsunami waves. No serious injuries were reported, officials said.

entries.author: Ivan Nechepurenko and Nataliya Vasilyeva

media_credit.content: Geophysical Survey of the Russian Academy of Sciences, via Reuters

entries.credit: Geophysical Survey of the Russian Academy of Sciences, via Reuters

content.value: In this handout photo, tsunami waves flood an area after an earthquake struck off Russia’s Kamchatka Peninsula on Wednesday.

entries.title: Flights Are Disrupted at Airports Across U.K. After Radar Problem

title_detail.value: Flights Are Disrupted at Airports Across U.K. After Radar Problem

entries.summary: A company that provides air traffic control services said it had resolved a “technical issue.” The delays came months after a power outage forced Heathrow Airport to shut down for 16 hours.

summary_detail.value: A company that provides air traffic control services said it had resolved a “technical issue.” The delays came months after a power outage forced Heathrow Airport to shut down for 16 hours.

authors.name: Jonathan Wolfe and Michael D. Shear

entries.author: Jonathan Wolfe and Michael D. Shear

author_detail.name: Jonathan Wolfe and Michael D. Shear

content.value: Departing flights were grounded at Heathrow on Wednesday, months after a fire at a power substation shut down the airport for around 16 hours.

entries.title: Pro-Palestinian Group Can Appeal U.K. Ban, Judge Rules, Citing Free Speech

title_detail.value: Pro-Palestinian Group Can Appeal U.K. Ban, Judge Rules, Citing Free Speech

entries.summary: A High Court judge in London said that Palestine Action had the right to challenge the British government’s decision to ban it as a terrorist group.

summary_detail.value: A High Court judge in London said that Palestine Action had the right to challenge the British government’s decision to ban it as a terrorist group.

entries.author: Lizzie Dearden

tags.term: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

content.value: Supporters of the group Palestine Action protesting outside the High Court in London this month.

entries.title: Brazil’s President Lula Speaks On Trump’s 50% Tariff Threat, Bolsonaro’s Trial

title_detail.value: Brazil’s President Lula Speaks On Trump’s 50% Tariff Threat, Bolsonaro’s Trial

entries.summary: In an interview with Jack Nicas of The New York Times, President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva rejected President Trump’s demands for Brazil. Here’s how the United States and Brazil reached this point.

summary_detail.value: In an interview with Jack Nicas of The New York Times, President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva rejected President Trump’s demands for Brazil. Here’s how the United States and Brazil reached this point.

entries.title: In Kamchatka, Epicenter of the Russian Earthquake, Seismic Activity Is Common

title_detail.value: In Kamchatka, Epicenter of the Russian Earthquake, Seismic Activity Is Common

entries.summary: Tremors are regularly reported in this remote Russian peninsula dotted with volcanoes, some of which erupt every year.

summary_detail.value: Tremors are regularly reported in this remote Russian peninsula dotted with volcanoes, some of which erupt every year.

entries.title: Trump Administration Told Taiwan’s President to Avoid U.S. Stopover

title_detail.value: Trump Administration Told Taiwan’s President to Avoid U.S. Stopover

entries.summary: The Taiwanese leader canceled U.S. transit visits after being urged to change his plans, two officials said. Washington has been in talks with Beijing over trade and a possible summit.

summary_detail.value: The Taiwanese leader canceled U.S. transit visits after being urged to change his plans, two officials said. Washington has been in talks with Beijing over trade and a possible summit.

authors.name: Amy Chang Chien, Chris Buckley and Edward Wong

author_detail.name: Amy Chang Chien, Chris Buckley and Edward Wong

content.value: President Lai Ching-te of Taiwan in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, last month. He suffered a political setback on Saturday when a recall campaign aimed at removing several opposition lawmakers failed.

entries.title: A Seaside Refuge in Gaza, Torn Apart by an Israeli Strike

title_detail.value: A Seaside Refuge in Gaza, Torn Apart by an Israeli Strike

entries.summary: The Israeli military said it killed at least three Hamas operatives at Al-Baqa Cafe. It also killed a journalist, an artist and two best friends reconciling after a fight.

entries.title: Brazil’s President Lula Voices Frustration With Trump Amid Tariff Battle
